message: I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you, Bob. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle from my original offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1080000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the minimum I'm willing to accept.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1055000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to a fair price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $1080000 was a bit aggressive, so I'm willing to come down to $1070000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle from here.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1065000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob, as we're not seeing eye-to-eye on the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not giving away too much. I'm going to try to meet you in the middle from your last offer. I'm counteroffering at $1065000. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'm going to have to consider other options.
I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1062500 for the product.
